title: Identify and Name
text: We are looking for all three angles and we can name them all. "x" is the first angle, "x+30" is the second angle, and $$90$$ is the third angle because it is a right triangle.

title: Translate
text: Each of the three angles added together equals $$180$$ degrees, $$x+x+30+90=180$$

title: Solve
text: First let's simplify the left side of the equation. What is $$x+x+30+90$$?

title: Solve
text: Now, we can subtract $$120$$ from both sides of the equation to find $$2x$$

title: Solve
text: Now, we have $$2x=60$$, so we can divide both sides by $$2$$ to get $$x$$.
